Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is more detailed and can be used anytime, which helped me a lot when I struggled.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: The teachers feedback would feel more reliable and serious as the teacher has the marking criteria and would potentially be the marker.
